content.raw: Can this pull request please be integrated into 3.1?  We spent all that time finding out that the geometric_shapes ROS package only handles STL files, but those files aren't being packaged with the v3 models in the 3.1 debian install.
content.html: Can this pull request please be integrated into 3.1? We spent all that time finding out that the geometric_shapes ROS package only handles STL files, but those files aren't being packaged with the v3 models in the 3.1 debian install.
